description: Initiates a search across emails in the specified archive.

parameters.name: ArchiveId
parameters.description: The identifier of the archive to search emails in.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Criteria to filter which emails are included in the search results. Include (list) --- The filter conditions for emails to include. (dict) --- A filter condition used to include or exclude emails when exporting from or searching an archive. BooleanExpression (dict) --- A boolean expression to evaluate against email attributes. The email attribute value to evaluate. Attribute (string) --- The name of the email attribute to evaluate. The boolean operator to use for evaluation. StringExpression (dict) --- A string expression to evaluate against email attributes. The attribute of the email to evaluate. The operator to use when evaluating the string values. The list of string values to evaluate the email attribute against. (string) --- Unless (list) --- The filter conditions for emails to exclude. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Include
nested_params.description: The filter conditions for emails to include.

nested_params.name: BooleanExpression
nested_params.description: A boolean expression to evaluate against email attributes.

nested_params.name: Evaluate
nested_params.description: The email attribute value to evaluate.

nested_params.name: Attribute
nested_params.description: The name of the email attribute to evaluate.

nested_params.name: Operator
nested_params.description: The boolean operator to use for evaluation.

nested_params.name: StringExpression
nested_params.description: A string expression to evaluate against email attributes.

nested_params.name: Evaluate
nested_params.description: The attribute of the email to evaluate.

nested_params.name: Attribute

nested_params.name: Operator
nested_params.description: The operator to use when evaluating the string values.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The list of string values to evaluate the email attribute against.

nested_params.name: Unless
nested_params.description: The filter conditions for emails to exclude.

nested_params.name: BooleanExpression
nested_params.description: A boolean expression to evaluate against email attributes.

nested_params.name: Evaluate
nested_params.description: The email attribute value to evaluate.

nested_params.description: The boolean operator to use for evaluation.

nested_params.description: A string expression to evaluate against email attributes.

nested_params.description: The attribute of the email to evaluate.

nested_params.name: Attribute

nested_params.name: Operator

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The list of string values to evaluate the email attribute against.

parameters.name: FromTimestamp
parameters.description: The start timestamp of the range to search emails from.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of search results to return.

parameters.name: ToTimestamp
parameters.description: The end timestamp of the range to search emails from.

nested_items.name: SearchId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the initiated search job.
